title: [Self-Directed] Restorative Dentistry Online Course: Web-Based Learning for Intermediate Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of foundational dental care and restorative treatment
context.additional_context: Learners access the LMS via personal devices, progressing at their self-directed pace and sequence. Combines project-based assessment with pre- and post-knowledge evaluations

learning_goals: Learners can explain the latest technologies and clinical applications in restorative dentistry
Learners can establish comprehensive restorative treatment plans using online learning materials
